benchmark_details.name: Unmasking Contextual Stereotypes: Measuring and Mitigating BERTâ€™s Gender Bias
benchmark_details.overview: This paper focuses on measuring and mitigating gender bias in BERT by examining associations between gender-denoting target words and names of professions in English and German. The study presents a new Bias Evaluation Corpus with Professions (BEC-Pro) and demonstrates methodologies for assessing and reducing biases.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure and mitigate gender bias in BERT and promote fairness in NLP systems.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Focus on gender bias only; binary gender perspective used.

data.annotation: Sentences constructed from templates; contains gender-denoting phrases and professional terms.

methodology.calculation: Logarithm of the ratio of target probabilities to prior probabilities.
methodology.interpretation: Positive associations reveal bias favoring gender-specific professions.
methodology.validation: Comparison with real-world U.S. workforce statistics

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Bias analysis based on gender-specific associations in professions.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data used from publicly available sources, ensuring no personal data breach.
